titleInfo.title: Hubert Davis Memorial Bluegrass Concert and Benefit

mods.abstract: Four color window card (black, blue, green, and pink on white) announcing teh Hubert Davis Memorial Bluegrass Concert and Benefit featuring the Eddie Adcock Band, Harley Allen and Debbie Nims, the Bluegrass Album Band wit Tony Rice, J.D. Crowe, Doyle Lawson and Jerry Douglas, Kathy Chiavola, the Cluster Pluckers, Mike Compton and David Grier, Hubert Davis' Season Travelers, the Doug Dillard Band with Ginger Boatwright, Glen Duncan, Larry Cordle and Lonesome Standard Time, The Gillis Brothers, Josh Graves and Kenny Bakes, Jim and Jesse and the Virginia Boys, Charlie Louvin and Charles Whitstein, Benny Martin, Del McCoury, the Nashville Bluegrass Band, the Osborne Brothers, Larry Perkins and Leroy Troy, the Reno Brothers, the Larry Stevens Band, and Porter Wagoner at the Bluegrass Inn on July 27-29.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
